channel.title: Docker on Davaun McClellan
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Davaun McClellan

item.title: Homelab
item.description: Home lab •Virtualization and containerization lab running Proxmox, Docker, and Kubernetes. Services originally hosted on virtual machines were converted to containers on docker, and recently swapped to Kubernetes. •Setup web proxy on Kubernetes cluster to redirect traffic and add proper TLS certificates from ‘Lets Encrypt’ to all web applications.
